text: Jason Thomas Smith (born June 16, 1980) is an American businessman and Republican politician. He has been the U.S. representative for Missouri's 8th congressional district since 2013. Before, Smith served in the Missouri House of Representatives. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman Jason Smith * Jason Smith for Congress * * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Missouri Category:Politicians from St. Louis, Missouri Category:Businesspeople from St. Louis, Missouri Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Jason Smith (politician)
